description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，副国级领导人。曾任国防科学技术工业委员会主任、中国商用飞机有限责任公司董事长、河北省省长、中共黑龙江省委书记、中共湖南省委书记等职务。现任第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a national-level deputy leader. He has served as the Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, Chairman of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Governor of Hebei, Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, and Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee. He is currently a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国陕西省西安市的一所大学，张庆伟在此获得工学硕士学位。
description.en: A university in Xi'an, Shaanxi, China, where Zhang Qingwei obtained his Master of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 中国北京市的一所大学，张庆伟在此获得管理学博士学位。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, where Zhang Qingwei obtained his Doctor of Management degree.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本的一所大学，张庆伟曾于1992年在此进修半年。
description.en: A university located in Japan, where Zhang Qingwei studied for six months in 1992.

en: Xi'an Aircraft Design and Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 原中国航空工业部下属研究所，张庆伟大学毕业后在此工作。
description.en: A research institute under the former Ministry of Aviation Industry of China, where Zhang Qingwei worked after graduating from university.

nodes.id: 中国运载火箭技术研究院

zh-cn: 中国运载火箭技术研究院
en: China Academy of Launch Vehicle Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国航天科技集团下属机构，张庆伟曾在此任职并担任副院长。
description.en: An entity under the China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation, where Zhang Qingwei held positions including Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一代歼击轰炸机，张庆伟是其工程组组长。
description.en: China's first generation fighter-bomber; Zhang Qingwei was the leader of its engineering group.

description.zh-cn: 中国的载人航天计划，张庆伟曾担任副总指挥。
description.en: China's human spaceflight program, for which Zhang Qingwei served as Deputy Commander-in-Chief.

nodes.id: 中国绕月探测工程领导小组

zh-cn: 中国绕月探测工程领导小组
en: Leading Group of the Chinese Lunar Exploration Program

description.zh-cn: 负责领导嫦娥一号等探月工程的机构，张庆伟曾任组长。
description.en: The body responsible for leading lunar exploration projects such as Chang'e 1; Zhang Qingwei served as its leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国首次载人航天飞行任务，张庆伟作为中国载人航天工程副总指挥负责统筹其发射任务。
description.en: China's first human spaceflight mission; Zhang Qingwei, as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, was responsible for coordinating its launch.

description.zh-cn: 中国第二次载人航天飞行任务，张庆伟作为中国载人航天工程副总指挥负责统筹其发射任务。
description.en: China's second human spaceflight mission; Zhang Qingwei, as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, was responsible for coordinating its launch.

zh-cn: 中国航天科技集团公司
en: China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation

description.zh-cn: 中国主要的空间技术公司之一，张庆伟曾担任副总经理和总经理。
description.en: One of China's main space technology companies, where Zhang Qingwei served as Deputy General Manager and General Manager.

nodes.id: 国防科学技术工业委员会

zh-cn: 国防科学技术工业委员会
中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会
en: Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense

description.zh-cn: 曾为中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管国防科技工业。张庆伟是其最后一任主任。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, in charge of the national defense science and technology industry. Zhang Qingwei was its last director.

zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国一家航空航天制造公司，张庆伟曾担任其董事长。
description.en: A Chinese aerospace manufacturer, where Zhang Qingwei served as Chairman.

nodes.id: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会
en: Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 黑龙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 黑龙江省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Congress

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省委员会
en: Hunan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
第十四届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替张庆伟担任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Zhang Qingwei as the Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，张庆伟的前任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zhang Qingwei's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，张庆伟的前任中共黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zhang Qingwei's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替张庆伟担任中共黑龙江省委书记和河北省省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and Governor of Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，张庆伟的前任河北省省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zhang Qingwei's predecessor as Governor of Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，张庆伟的前任国防科学技术工业委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zhang Qingwei's predecessor as Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。张庆伟担任国防科工委主任时，温家宝是其上级。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Wen Jiabao was Zhang Qingwei's superior when Zhang was the Director of COSTIND.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟于1992年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei joined the Communist Party of China in December 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1978年9月考入西北工业大学飞机系学习，后于1985年9月回到该校攻读硕士学位，1988年3月毕业。
description.en: He was admitted to the Aircraft Department of Northwestern Polytechnical University in September 1978, returned to the university in September 1985 to pursue a master's degree, and graduated in March 1988.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟在北京航空航天大学获得管理科学与工程专业在职研究生学历及管理学博士学位。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei obtained an on-the-job postgraduate education in Management Science and Engineering and a Doctor of Management degree from Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，张庆伟被派往日本国际空间大学进修半年。
description.en: In 1992, Zhang Qingwei was sent to the International Space University in Japan for six months of advanced study.

relationships.target: 中国运载火箭技术研究院

description.zh-cn: 1988年3月进入该研究院工作，后于1996年8月出任副院长。
description.en: He began working at the academy in March 1988 and was appointed Deputy Director in August 1996.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟曾参与“飞豹”歼击轰炸机的研发工作，并担任工程组组长。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei participated in the development of the 'Flying Leopard' fighter-bomber and served as the leader of the engineering group.

relationships.target: 中国绕月探测工程领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1999年7月任副总经理，2001年11月升任总经理。
description.en: Appointed Deputy General Manager in July 1999, and promoted to General Manager in November 2001.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国载人航天工程副总指挥，负责统筹神舟五号的发射任务。
description.en: As Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, he was responsible for coordinating the launch of Shenzhou 5.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国载人航天工程副总指挥，负责统筹神舟六号的发射任务。
description.en: As Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, he was responsible for coordinating the launch of Shenzhou 6.

relationships.target: 国防科学技术工业委员会

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟于2011年8月任代省长，2012年1月正式当选省长。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei became acting governor in August 2011 and was officially elected governor in January 2012.

relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会
黑龙江省人民代表大会常务委员会
中国共产党湖南省委员会
湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会
第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟是中共第十六届至第二十届中央委员。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei is a member of the 16th to 20th Central Committees of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟在担任省级党委书记期间，习近平是其直接上级（中共中央总书记）。
description.en: During Zhang Qingwei's tenure as a provincial party secretary, Xi Jinping was his direct superior (General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee).

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟担任全国人大常委会副委员长，直接向委员长赵乐际负责。
description.en: As Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Zhang Qingwei reports directly to Chairman Zhao Leji.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟担任国防科工委主任期间，向时任国务院总理温家宝汇报工作。
description.en: During his tenure as Director of COSTIND, Zhang Qingwei reported to then-Premier Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟接替许达哲，出任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei succeeded Xu Dazhe as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 沈晓明接替张庆伟，出任中共湖南省委书记。
description.en: Shen Xiaoming succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟接替王宪魁，出任中共黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei succeeded Wang Xiankui as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 许勤先后接替张庆伟的河北省省长和中共黑龙江省委书记职务。
description.en: Xu Qin successively succeeded Zhang Qingwei as Governor of Hebei and Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟接替陈全国，出任河北省代省长。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei succeeded Chen Quanguo as acting Governor of Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 张庆伟接替张云川，出任国防科学技术工业委员会主任。
description.en: Zhang Qingwei succeeded Zhang Yunchuan as Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense.
